name: Magic Ball (Amigafans)
overview: Our task is to get the ball to the exit by jumping on the different platforms. The game was created using the WinUAE emulator and works well on it. Remember that some platforms are safe and others are full of danger, enemies. Find the keys to open the locks. Pull the switch, climb the ladder, get more energy and use the teleporter, avoid the spikes and make your way to the exit.
